page.description: The Label property represents the actual text that appears as a control's label. To create a label simply fill in the textbox next to the property.

figure.title: Adding a 'Temperature' Label to a slider control
A 'Temperature' Label on a slider control

section.description: Alternatively, you can also click the [...] button next to the Label property and then enter the Label name into the Enter Text Dialog. This also gives you easy access to the HTML editor.

figure.title: A 'Temperature' Label on a QR control
